Data: Prasanna to Ponting, 1 run full ball is guided to midwicket for a single
Prasanna to Watson, no run tossed up, full and on off, punched back by Watson, Prasanna once again shows how good he is fielding off his bowling, diving acrobatically across the pitch to stop that
Prasanna to Watson, no run slapped towards cover this time
Prasanna to Watson, no run drifting outside leg and going straight after pitching, Watson is struck on the pad

Prasanna to Watson, FOUR runs a touch short and Watson power-heave makes it appearance, absolutely hammers that over midwicket, there's a man on the boundary but he can't get near that as it bounces away for four
Prasanna to Watson, 1 run
Angelo Mathews to Watson, 1 run works it away towards midwicket for a single
Angelo Mathews to Ponting, no run short of a length ball and on middle and off, 118kph, gentle run-up from Mathews, defended to the leg side
Angelo Mathews to Ponting, no run short of length ball just outside off, defended to the off side
Angelo Mathews to Ponting, 1 run short from Mathews, Ponting unfurls a pull shot, swivels as he plays it, gets a single for his efforts
Angelo Mathews to Watson, 1 run on middle and leg, tapped towards square leg for a single

Angelo Mathews to Ponting, no run Ponting looks to whip this short of length ball to the leg side, he misses and is struck on the pad, that was heading down the leg side so there was only a muted lbw appeal
Prasanna to Watson, no run length ball outside off, Watson crouches low as he blocks it
Prasanna to Watson, 1 run powers this towards deep extra cover for a single
Prasanna to Ponting, no run lovely delivery, Prasanna gets this one to rip after pitching on leg and middle, spins past the outside edge as Ponting looks to guide it to the off side
Prasanna to Ponting, FOUR runs flighted length ball, Ponting latches on to that, plays it inside-out and over cover for a boundary
Prasanna to Ponting, no run this is another one that nearly goes straight, Ponting looking for the turn as he tries to defend to the off, inside-edge towards the leg side
Prasanna to Ponting, FOUR runs very short from Prasanna, Ponting says thank you and muscles that to the midwicket boundary
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run defends the first ball of the over towards mid-on
Angelo Mathews to Watson, 1 run full and angling in, Watson punches that down to long-on for a single
Angelo Mathews to Ponting, no run nips in from a short of length, Ponting looks to defend to the off side, struck on the pads above the knee roll, but was hit outside off

Angelo Mathews to Ponting, OUT there's the breakthrough, that ball comes on slower than Ponting expected, he was early into the shot, and the ball lobs up towards midwicket, Suraj Randiv jumps forward and snaffles the ball, it was the offcutter from Mathews, not sure Ponting picked it
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run so what if I bowl at 120, I can still bowl bouncers, says Mathews, Clarke is surprised by that one, sways out of the way though
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run gets behind the line of this offstump delivery and defends it
Prasanna to Watson, no run
Prasanna to Watson, 1 run Watson stretches forwards and eases the ball towards long-off for a single
Prasanna to Clarke, no run a bit of air, Clarke backs away to make room and slaps the ball towards cover where Dilshan fields smartly
Prasanna to Clarke, no run defended of the back foot
Prasanna to Clarke, no run an inside-edge, again Clarke expects more turn than there is, he was looking to defend to the off side, the ball dribbles towards midwicket
Prasanna to Clarke, 2 runs short and well outside off, Clarke hangs back and slices that past point to get off the mark
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run full and outside off, that is blocked by Watson
Angelo Mathews to Watson, no run more defence from Watson as that one from Mathews nips in
Angelo Mathews to Watson, 1 run short from Mathews and that is pulled towards midwicket for a single
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run length ball outside off, defended off the front foot towards cover
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, no run patient from Clarke, watchfully played out to the off side
Angelo Mathews to Clarke, 1 run a bit short from Mathews and that is whipped towards deep midwicket
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run on target straightaway, length ball on off, not much turn, defended by Clarke
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run a bit short on middle and leg, Clarke rocks back and pushes it to the right of the bowler, who moves across quickly to field
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run short from Mendis, Clarke pulls it to midwicket
Jeevan Mendis to Watson, no run length ball heading for middle and off, careful defence from Watson
Jeevan Mendis to Watson, 1 run a touch short and on legstump, Watson gets well back and eases it towards long-on
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run slapped a diving point fielder, sweeper cover does the fielding
Mendis to Clarke, no run flighted and full, just outside off, Clarke defends off the front foot
Mendis to Clarke, no run tossed up again, on offstump, punched back towards the bowler
Mendis to Clarke, no run outside off, this one goes straight on, Clarke makes room and cuts but can't beat point
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run works this one towards midwicket for a single
Mendis to Watson, 1 run sliding down the leg side, Watson guides the ball in front of square leg
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run Mendis drops it short again, steered towards sweeper cover for a single
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run tapped down to long-on for a single
Jeevan Mendis to Watson, no run tossed up and that is defended towards cover
Jeevan Mendis to Watson, SIX runs there's the big hit, pure power from Watson, who hammers it over deep midwicket for six, that was a flat hit
Jeevan Mendis to Watson, FOUR runs short from Mendis, Watson clubs this past extra cover for four more, he moves on to 46
Jeevan Mendis to Watson, no run full and straight, Watson defends it cautiously
Jeevan Mendis to Watson, no run plays the final ball of the over late, steers it towards short third
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run flighted and full, worked past midwicket for a single
Mendis to Watson, no run shortish and wide, Watson looks to power that through cover, can't time it ver y well
Mendis to Watson, no run fuller this time, remains wide of off, pushed towards cover off the front foot
Mendis to Watson, no run length ball, close to off, Watson still decides to go for the cut, makes room and slaps it to backward point
Mendis to Watson, no run punched back to the bowler this time
Mendis to Watson, no run and only one off that over as Watson plays the final ball back to Ajantha Mendis
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run short of length ball on middle and leg, cautious forward defence from Clarke
Jeevan Mendis to Watson, 1 run nearly takes out Michael Clarke with a muscled hit towatds long-on, Clarke skips out of the way
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run a full ball is driven back towards the bowler
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run whips this one behind square leg for a single, thinks of the second but there's no time
Jeevan Mendis to Watson, 1 run short and wide, Mendis lucky to escape there, Watson makes room and lashes that towards cover but the timing isn't great
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run overpitched, Clarke sashays down the track and drives towards extra cover
Mendis to Watson, 2 runs Watson gets to fifty, laces the ball towards sweeper cover to get to that minor landmark
Mendis to Watson, 1 run punched to the right of the bowler and down to long-on for a single
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run Clarke was initially looking to get forward there, stays on the crease and tucks the ball to midwicket
Mendis to Watson, 1 run outside off and Watson steers it towards cover point for a single
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run short and very wide, Clarke reaches out for that one, jabs it past point
Mendis to Watson, no run finally a dot ball in the over, Clarke looks to drive down the ground but gets an inside-edge, ball rolls to the leg side
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run Clarke goes well back in the crease, shuffles across and nudges the ball to square leg
Jeevan Mendis to Watson, 1 run overpitched and on legstump, whipped towards midwicket
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run short and wide, seems to be plenty of those on offer, Clarke gets back and slashes that towards deep point

Jeevan Mendis to Watson, 2 byes that short ball keeps low and foxes everyone, Watson was again looking to launch that to midwicket, the ball sneaks under the bat, Sangakkara is also taken by surprise and is nutmegged, some byes result, Mendis kicks the ground in annoyance
Malinga to Clarke, no run starts with a shortish ball on middle, batsman gets behind the line and defends
Malinga to Clarke, no run length ball in the channel outside off, Clarke helps it along towards short third man
Malinga to Clarke, no run shorter this time, and it is blocked down the track
Malinga to Clarke, no run Malinga searching for the blockhole, ends up a touch shorter than he wants, Clarke wants to club that to the leg side, mistimed to midwicket
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run short and wide this time, Clarke cuts and gets it past point
Malinga to Watson, no run a low full toss on middle stump, pushed towards mid-on, not much power behind that shot, Watson happy to just keep that one out
Prasanna to Clarke, 1 run on middle and leg stump, clipped towards backward square leg
Prasanna to Watson, no run Watson looking to cut a full delivery, he has got away with that a few times, this time it bounces over the top edge
Prasanna to Watson, no run watchful forward defensive towards the bowler
Prasanna to Watson, no run once again full face of the bat as he pats it to the bowler
Prasanna to Watson, no run a touch short this time, Watson stands tall and defends to off

Prasanna to Watson, no run lovely from Prasanna, Watson is beaten by the turn, pitching on offstump and drawing Watson forward, he wants to tap that to the off side but the ball spins past the outside edge
Malinga to Clarke, FOUR runs streaky for Clarke, Malinga gives him some width, Clarke chases after it and gets a top edge, it flies well wide of the keeper and fine enough to beat third man
Malinga to Clarke, no run played with soft hands towards point for a single
Malinga to Clarke, no run Clarke punches it to the left of mid-on, there isn't enough time to get a run
Malinga to Clarke, 1 run short of length ball on middle, Clarke whips it towards square leg
Malinga to Watson, no run a short ball from Malinga, bounces loopily outside off, Watson sways out of the way of that one
Malinga to Watson, 1 wide another bouncer, good line but was too high, over the batsman's head and that's a wide, Watson was initially looking to hook but pulls out on seeing how big the ball got
Malinga to Watson, 2 runs full and on legstump, thumped towards midwicket, Watson picks up a couple
Prasanna to Clarke, no run the wrong ?n from Prasanna, Clarke didn't read that, lucky to get an inside-edge on to the pad
Prasanna to Clarke, 1 run helped past square leg for a single
Prasanna to Watson, no run
Prasanna to Watson, 1 run down the leg side, helped towards deep square leg to bring up the 50 partnership
Prasanna to Clarke, 1 run Clarke using his feet to get to the pitch and turns it towards deep midwicket
Prasanna to Watson, no run guided down to short third to end a good over from Prasanna
Mendis to Clarke, FOUR runs Clarke again uses his feet, the carrom ball from Mendis, Clarke reaches the pitch of the ball and lifts it over mid-off to get a boundary to long-off
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run guides this one towards short fine leg for a single
Mendis to Watson, no run better ball from Mendis, length ball pitching on off, careful defence from Watson
Mendis to Watson, no run punched firmly back towards the bowler

Mendis to Watson, OUT the end of Watson, the flighted googly, Watson tried to hammer it over midwicket, gets a top edge and the ball swirls high, Tharanga gets under it at deep midwicket and pouches it
Mendis to Clarke, FOUR runs short ball to end the over, Clarke rocks back and puts that away past square leg for four
Prasanna to Hussey, no run full and wide outside off, Hussey gets his front leg well outside off as he leaves the ball
Prasanna to Hussey, no run Hussey stays in the crease and looks to steer that outside off ball towards cover, he's beaten
Prasanna to Hussey, no run pushed towards mid-off, Hussey wants one, Clarke asks him to stay put
Prasanna to Hussey, no run outside off, Hussey shoulders arms
Prasanna to Hussey, no run once more well outside off, left alone
Prasanna to Hussey, no run a maiden from Prasanna, the first since the first over of the innings, Hussey tucks the final ball of the over to midwicket
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run shortish, Clarke works it backward square leg
Mendis to Hussey, 1 run length ball outside off, Hussey steps forward and drive that towards deep extra cover to get off the mark
Mendis to Clarke, no run length ball sliding towards leg, defended down the pitch
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run Clarke shuffles across and tucks the ball behind square for one more
Mendis to Hussey, 1 wide sprays this down the leg side, Hussey tries to sweep but doesn't connect
Mendis to Hussey, 1 run Mendis lucky that only went for a single, it slipped out of his hand and was a half-tracker, sat up for Hussey who could only slug it deep backward square leg
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run Clarke again shimmies across the stump and dabs the ball towards midwicket
Prasanna to Clarke, 1 run overpitched on legstump, Clarke has been using his feet well this innings, once again he charges down and works the ball towards long-on
Prasanna to Hussey, 1 run defended to the off side and the batsmen zip through for a single
Prasanna to Clarke, 1 run heading down leg once more, Clarke moves across and guides it behind square leg
Prasanna to Hussey, no run length ball outside off, once more Hussey defends to the off side, Clarke rejects the call for a single
Prasanna to Hussey, 1 run gets to the pitch and punches it towards long-on
Prasanna to Clarke, no run spinning down the leg side, an appeal for a caught-behind from Sanga, not much from the bowler, off the pads I think
Mendis to Hussey, 1 run full ball is punched towards mid-off
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run the legspinner from Mendis, length ball is pushed towards cover

Mendis to Hussey, no run huge appeal, the straighter one from Mendis, Huseey misses that one and is struck below the knee roll, that might have been slipping down leg, replays show it is going to hit leg, Hussey lucky to survive
Mendis to Hussey, 1 run
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run full ball is guided towards mid-on
Mendis to Hussey, no run

Prasanna to Clarke, no run down the leg side and that was a tough stumping chance, Sanga can't collect that and Clarke sets off for a single before realising the ball isn't too far from the stumps.. Sanga lobs the ball at the stumps but misses and Clarke survives
Prasanna to Clarke, 1 run driven to the right of the diving fielder to get a single

Prasanna to Hussey, OUT the googly does the job, Hussey looking to drive that one, doesn't read the turn, gets a thin outside edge, Sanga collects and that's another wicket for Sri Lanka, big innings coming up this for David Hussey
Prasanna to Hussey, 2 runs pushed towards the off side
Prasanna to Hussey, no run defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Prasanna to Hussey, no run tossed up outside off stump, driven towards long-off but not timed well
Mendis to Clarke, 1 run Clarke moves forward and drives the ball to long-on
Mendis to Hussey, no run Hussey moves back and tries to force the ball through the off, but mis-times it towards the bowler
Mendis to Hussey, no run Hussey defends back to the bowler, he's looking extremely tentative
Mendis to Hussey, no run a short ball keeps extremely low and beats Hussey's pull, nearly bowled him
Mendis to Hussey, FOUR runs another short ball, this time it bounces properly, Hussey waits and pulls towards deep square leg
Mendis to Hussey, no run defended on the front foot towards the bowler
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run played off the back foot through cover point
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, no run watchful forwards defence from Hussey
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, no run shorter from Mendis, on middle stump, tentaively blocked
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, no run gets forward and sm0others this one
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, 1 run goes back and punches the ball towards long-off
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run sashays down the track and he defends it back to the bowler
Eranga to Hussey, FOUR runs overpitched from Eranga, Hussey latches on to that, scythes it to the cover boundary, not the best of starts for Eranga
Eranga to Hussey, no run length delivery on off, defended to the off side
Eranga to Hussey, no run full delivery this time, Hussey defends from the crease
Eranga to Hussey, no run a bit short from Eranga and that his hit towards cover
Eranga to Hussey, 1 run swung behind square leg for single
Eranga to Clarke, 1 run short of length ball outside off, Clarke gets on his toes and chops that past point
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run comes down the track and jabs it back towards the bowler
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, 1 run whipped towards long-on this time
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, 1 run a bit short once more, stays back and slaps it towards cover
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run playing down the wrong line this time, inside-edge towards the leg side
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run tossed up delivery, just outside off, another inside-edge on to the pad
Jeevan Mendis to Clarke, no run backs away to make room, guides the legspinner towards cover
Eranga to Hussey, no run opens the face to steer the ball towards point
Eranga to Hussey, no run spearing in towards the stump, Hussey wanted to whip that to the leg side, leading edge towards cover
Eranga to Hussey, no run short of length and just outside off, Hussey looks to cut but that slips under his bat
Eranga to Hussey, 1 run pushed towards mid-off for a tight single
Eranga to Clarke, 1 wide short and very wide, extra bounce there for Eranga, but too far outside off to worry the batsman
Eranga to Clarke, 2 runs a good-looking drive from Clarke, sends the ball towards deep extra cover

Eranga to Clarke, OUT Eranga has struck, this is a big blow, Clarke is gone, and Australia have two new batsmen at the crease, that was a short of length ball, pitching just outside off, goes on with angle and induces the outside edge, Clarke's patient innings comes to an end
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, no run steered towards point
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, FOUR runs a half-tracker for Hussey to put away, he gets back and wallops it towards midwicket for four
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, no run very wide outside off, Hussey looks to crunch that through the off but bottom edges it down the track
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, no run solidly defended down the pitch
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, no run defended to the off side this time
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, 2 runs another outside edge, would have been a simple take for first slip, there isn't one though and the ball runs down towards third man
Eranga to Haddin, no run short of length ball outside off, defended towards backward point
Eranga to Haddin, 1 run similar length, guides it down to third man for a single
Eranga to Hussey, no run slaps this one towards backward point
Eranga to Hussey, 1 run Eranga keeps it back of a length, provides width this time, chopped towards deep backward point
Eranga to Haddin, no run full this time, aiming for the blockhole, driven towards mid-on for a single
Eranga to Haddin, 2 wide short and down the leg side, Sangakkara leaps to try collect that, gets a glove on it
Eranga to Hussey, no run aims to cut this one, bottom-edges it to the right of the keeper, Sanga moves across to collect
Jeevan Mendis to Haddin, 1 run flighted and pitched up, driven back towards the bowler
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, no run short this time, outside off, Hussey gets back and slaps it towards cover
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, 2 runs a full toss but that isn't put away, Hussey thumps it down the ground, finishing the stroke with a typical flourish, but he can't get it past long-on
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, no run punched back towards the bowler
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, no run good over this, only three so far, once more defended to the left of the bowler
Jeevan Mendis to Hussey, 1 run muscles it towards cover, but a diving stop prevents it from going too far, the cover love the acrobatic fielding
Malinga to Hussey, no run Malinga returns, and starts with a typical delivery aiming for the toes, dug out towards midwicket
Malinga to Hussey, no run a low full toss this time, Hussey looks to swing it to midwicket, but inside-edges it on to his pad
Malinga to Hussey, no run another full toss, Hussey backing away, that was beyond leg stump but Hussey had skipped further beyond, bunts it towards mid-on
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run a hat-trick of full tosses, this one is on off stump, Hussey swings it towards mid-off for a single
Malinga to Haddin, no run a dipping full toss from Malinga, just outside off, Haddin blocks it to the off side
Malinga to Haddin, 1 run this time Malinga drops it short of the yorker he wants, Haddin lashes it towards sweeper cover
Mendis to Haddin, no run full and heading for off, pushed back towards the bowler
Mendis to Haddin, no run keeps it around off, again patted back to the bowler
Mendis to Haddin, 1 run there's the swipe from Haddin, he doesn't hit it hard enough to carry all the way to the deep midwicket fielder
Mendis to Hussey, 1 run
Mendis to Haddin, no run Sanga roars out an appeal, Haddin is struck on the pads as he looks sweep, that looked to be sliding down, Rauf turns down the appeal
Mendis to Haddin, FOUR runs a boundary to end the over, Haddin muscles it to the deep midwicket boundary
Malinga to Hussey, FOUR runs Malinga continues his pursuit of the blockhole, Hussey wants to club that over the on side but gets an inside-edge that zips past the keeper for four
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run this time it is on target, Malinga goes full and for middle, Hussey mistimes it towards mid-on

Malinga to Haddin, 1 leg bye low full toss spearing down leg, there is another big lbw appeal as Haddin can't get bat on ball, again that slipping down, the ball dribbles away to the on side for a leg bye
Malinga to Hussey, 2 runs slower length ball from Malinga, 118kph, off the toe of the bat and over the bowler's head for a couple

Malinga to Hussey, FOUR runs Shot! superb hit from Hussey, Malinga pitches it short of the desired yorker length, Hussey gets his front leg out of the way and hammers it past extra cover for four, Malinga has a rueful grin after that shot
Malinga to Hussey, 1 run tailing in to the legs, inside-edged by Hussey, who was desperately trying to save his toes
Mendis to Hussey, 2 runs skips away from leg and punches that middle stump delivery towards deep extra cover for two

Mendis to Hussey, SIX runs brilliant from Hussey, charges down the track and launches that legspinner from Mendis towards the sightscreen, comfortably clears the rope, a good innings this from Hussey, he moves on to 46

Mendis to Hussey, OUT what a comeback from Mendis, that one spins in, Hussey doesn't read it and is caught on the back foot as he looks to cut that one, it slips past the bat and into middle and leg stump
Mendis to Johnson, no run length ball is tucked to the leg side
Mendis to Johnson, 1 run full and on the pads, tucked towards deep midwicket for a single
Mendis to Haddin, no run a dot ball to end the over as Haddin is struck on the pads outside leg
Malinga to Johnson, no run slower length ball, 116kph, Johnson spots it and checks his shot, defends to the off side

Malinga to Johnson, OUT Malinga you beauty, that spot-on yorker is far too good for Johnson, who was striving to get his bat down and keep that out but the ball zips past the batsman's defence and crashes into the bottom of legstump

Malinga to Hastings, OUT Malinga is on a hat-trick now, or is Australia going to review this lbw? They have reviewed it. It was a low full toss, swinging dangerously in, the new batsman John Hastings couldn't keep it out, thuds into his pads, struck in front of legstump, umpire upholds the appeal, was it going down? the replay shows it would have

Malinga to Doherty, OUT hat-trick for Malinga, another of those laser-guided low full tosses, Xavier Doherty has no chance, the middle stump is rattled, and Australia are down to 211 for 9, so much for the Powerplay, that's Malinga's third hat-trick in one-dayers, the most anyone has ever taken
Malinga to Pattinson, no run no he can't, it's full and well outside off, squeezed out towards the off side

Malinga to Pattinson, no run full and strikes Pattinson low on the pads, going down leg but that doesn't prevent Malinga from belting out an appeal, a triple-wicket maiden in the Powerplay, well done Malinga

Mendis to Haddin, OUT and the Australian inninigs has come to a rather rapid end, Mendis gets his third as Haddin tamely chips the ball to mid-off, Australua bowled out for 211, with nearly four overs remaining, two overs ago Australia were 210 for 5

Okay, I'm off to grab a bite. I'll be back at around 6.40pm. You could entertain yourself by watching this Brett Lee interview. Or you could hop over here to see whether India can prevent a whitewash.
On the plus side for Australia, there were decent knocks from Watson and Clarke early on, before David Hussey got some much-needed runs.

Well, that was quite a turnaround. Hussey and Haddin had put on 43 quick runs, and Australia seemed headed potentially for 250, before Malinga intervened. His staggeringly accurate yorkers/full tosses proved far too good for the Australian tail. Here's the full list of one-day hat-tricks.
We're all set for the chase, Tharanga to face, two slips in place, Johnson has the ball.
Johnson to Upul Tharanga, no run a full swinging ball on the legstump, clipped behind square leg by Tharanga
Johnson to Upul Tharanga, 4 leg byes and again, Johnson perhaps trying to do a Malinga, full and swinging in, down the leg side, off Tharanga's pads to fine leg for four
Johnson to Upul Tharanga, no run short of length ball just outside off, blocked back towards the bowler
Johnson to Sangakkara, FOUR runs fires it in full and on the pads, Sangakkara leans across and elegantly clips it to the midwicket boundary, the crowd finds its voice again
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run Sangakkara takes the bottom hand off the bat as he blocks a short of length ball to the leg side, a quick single is pinched
Pattinson to Sangakkara, no run starts with a back of length ball outside off, defended
Pattinson to Sangakkara, no run punched back towards the bowler this time
Pattinson to Sangakkara, 1 wide swinging down the leg side, and that's a free run
Pattinson to Sangakkara, no run Pattinson spears that in at 141kph, outside off and Sangakkara lets it go
Pattinson to Sangakkara, 2 runs seams in from short of a length, helped along to fine leg
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run sharply seams away after pitching on a back of a length, Mahela lets it through to the keeper
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 run jags in this time from Johnson, Dilshan attempts a Hollywood drive, gets an inside edge behind square leg
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball on legstump, tucked towards square leg
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pitched up and just outside off, pushed towards cover
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run a bouncer from Johnson, gets big on Mahela, off the handle of the bat and lands wide of slips
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 run Dilshan helps this one to square leg for a single
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run defends the final ball of the over to the leg side
Pattinson to Dilshan, no run length ball angling in towards off, pushed back towards the bowler
Pattinson to Dilshan, no run shortish ball outside off, Dilshan wants to launch that over midwicket, doesn't get near it
Pattinson to Dilshan, no run length ball in the channel outside off, jags away a touch, Dilshan is beaten as he looks to defend, impressive start from Pattinson
Pattinson to Dilshan, FOUR runs short ball on leg stump, this time the Dilshan pull connects, lands just short of the rope, one bounce four
Pattinson to Dilshan, no run prods the ball towards the off side, thinks of a single but decides against
Pattinson to Dilshan, FOUR runs full on middle and leg, whipped wide of mid-on for a boundary, early wickets aren't enough to make Dilshan change his game
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 3 runs caressed towards sweeper cover by Mahela, not much footwork but gracefully pushed for three
Johnson to Dilshan, no run short of length an around off stump, pushed towards point
Johnson to Dilshan, no run full and well outside off, Dilshan chases after it, though he was in no position to play that, he doesn't connect, D Hussey has his hands on his head as he expects an edge
Johnson to Dilshan, no run low, wide full toss, once more Dilshan stretches across and slaps the ball but can't get it past point
Johnson to Dilshan, FOUR runs this one is closer to the body, and short, Dilshan dismisses that to the square leg boundary, powerfully pulled away

Johnson to Dilshan, 3 runs another short ball, another pull from Dilshan, this time the timing isn't great, but the ball is in the gap, long chase for the midwicket fielder, enough time to get a three
Pattinson to Dilshan, no run Dilshan doesn't bother moving his feet or getting behind the line, wants to swing that one to the leg side, he doesn't connect
Pattinson to Dilshan, no run short ball sliding down, Dilshan gets in position for the pull, but that one keeps lower than Dilshan expects, he is hit in the stomach

Pattinson to Dilshan, OUT got him! Pattinson continues to catch the eye in this opening burst, after peppering Dilshan with the short stuff, he slips in a quick full ball, Dilshan is caught on the crease, he inside-edges that onto the pad, and the ball homes in on offstump, superb bowling from Pattinson
Pattinson to Silva, 1 leg bye appeal for lbw as Silva shuffles towards off and looks to flick a legside delivery, off the pad to left of Haddin
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run back of length ball, Jayawardene gets behind the line and defends it towards point
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run well outside off and that is left alone by Jayawardene
Johnson to Silva, no run angling across the stumps, left alone
Johnson to Silva, no run length ball outside off, left alone
Johnson to Silva, 1 wide superb take from Haddin, this was down the leg side and swerving away, leaps to his left and sticks out his hand to collect that, plenty of bounce there for Johnson

Johnson to Silva, no run massive appeal for lbw, that was pretty high though, Silva doesn't get forward or back as he looks defend a shortish ball from Johnson, he is struck above the pad, that would have definitely gone over the stumps
Johnson to Silva, 3 runs Silva slaps this length delivery through the covers, not too well timed but placed well enough to get himself three, and off the mark as well
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run full and outside off, nicely guided down to third man for a single
Johnson to Silva, FOUR runs shot! Silva gets forward and drives on the up, past a diving mid-off, that stroke should give him plenty of confidence
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run on the leg stump, helped along to fine leg, Mahela not trying fancy here, just guiding the ball behind the wicket
Pattinson to Silva, no run Silva goes for a booming drive through cover, a length ball angling across, he doesn't connect
Pattinson to Silva, no run shorter this time, just outside off and defended towards point
Pattinson to Silva, 2 runs worked past midwicket for a couple
Pattinson to Silva, no run a swinging 141kph delivery, perilously close to the edge, an airy drive from Silva, doesn't get bat on ball
Pattinson to Silva, no run short of length ball on offstump, solidly defended by Silva
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run on the pads, tucked towards midwicket for a quick single

Doherty to Silva, 2 runs outstanding fielding from Pattinson at deep square leg, a full toss is swept hard by Silva, well wide of Pattinson, who sprints across and does extremely well to keep it from reaching the rope, Clarke applauds the effort
Doherty to Silva, FOUR runs this time it is a boundary, another sweep this time well in front of square, lands just short of the rope
Doherty to Silva, no run
Doherty to Silva, no run jumps down the track and defends to the off side
Doherty to Silva, FOUR runs the sweep proving productive for Silva, one more of those gets him a boundary, this time very fine, and that makes it 11 off the over
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short of length and outside off, pushed towards cover
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run extra bounce and nips back as well, Mahela can't get bat on that one, it sneaks past the inside edge and strikes him on the thigh
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide well outside the off stump
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed towards point by Jayawardene
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide down the leg side, and that's a wide
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide Hastings is getting the ball to move here, but is getting the line badly wrong, down the leg side once again
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run much better line this time, pitching outside off and coming towards the stumps, batsman shoulders arms
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs short and wide, Mahela climbs into that one, the area around point is extremely productive for Mahela, he slaps that it past point for four
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide another wide outside off, Hastings needs to get his lines right
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run gets it on target this time, defended back towards the bowler
Watson to Silva, no run pushed off the front foot towards cover
Watson to Silva, no run nearly the end of Silva, he is drawn towards a short of length ball outside off, doesn't get the nick though
Watson to Silva, 1 wide short ball and that is miles over the batsman's head
Watson to Silva, 1 run short of length and on offstump, tapped towards mid-on and the batsmen immediately set off for a single

Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run a direct hit, is that out? Mahela pokes the ball towards cover and sets off a single, Ponting pounces on it and throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end, Mahela has just made it in time
Watson to Silva, 1 run tucked towards mid-on for a single
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball outside off, pushed towards mid-off off the front foot
Hastings to Silva, 1 wide way down the leg side
Hastings to Silva, no run Silva continues his uncomfortable stay, he closes the face looking to play to leg, leading edge towards gully
Hastings to Silva, no run sharp inward movement for Hastings, Silva inside-edges on to his pads
Hastings to Silva, no run well outside off and that is guided towards backward point
Hastings to Silva, no run overpitched and outside off, swings in and gets an inside-edge towards short leg
Hastings to Silva, 1 wide shortish and well outside off, a big cheer from the crowd as that is signalled wide, six wides from Hasting now
Hastings to Silva, 1 run driven towards wide mid-on for a single, Silva gets off the strike
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run another inducker, pitched up by Hastings, Jayawardene plays it towards midwicket
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide Watson's turn to spray it, down the leg side
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run much better line from Watson, on a length and just outside off, solidly defended to the off side
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run and a similar delivery, tucked towards midwicket for a single

Watson to Silva, no run Silva streaky stay continues, a massive appeal for lbw, turned down, Clarke wanted the review immediately, that pitches short of a length outside off, catches Silva on the back foot, hit in line but that was sliding down, silva survives much to the crowd's delight
Watson to Silva, FOUR runs another edge for Silva, he doesn't know where the middle of the bat is, throws his bat at a length ball outside off, outside edge flies wide of slip for four to third man

Watson to Silva, FOUR runs this time he has found the middle of the bat, a pitched up delivery, Silva dances down the track and punches that between the bowler and mid-on for four, superb timing on that
Watson to Silva, no run blocked to the right of Watson, who moves across quickly and prevents the single
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball just outside off, defended by Mahela
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run jags back in dramatically towards the batsman, who drops it towards point
Hastings to Silva, no run outside off and Silva wisely decides to leave
Hastings to Silva, 1 run Silva shimmies down the track before the bowler delivers, it is a length ball coming in, he gets it away towards short fine
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run confidently defended off the front foot towards cover
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run an uneventful over comes to an end, as Mahela allows an outside off ball through to the keeper
Johnson to Silva, 1 run Johnson starts the spell with a length ball on middle and off, pushed back past the bowler
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide Johnson joins the wides party, down the leg side
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run length ball on leg stump, tucked towards backward square leg
Johnson to Silva, FOUR runs lovely stroke from Chamara Silva, wide and full, Chamara gets well forward and caresses it for four in front of point
Johnson to Silva, no run length delivery angling across him, Silva pushes it to the off side
Johnson to Silva, 1 run tapped towards mid-off, a single is pinched as the fielder is on the edge of the circle
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run Mahela stands tall and defends the final ball of the over
Hastings to Silva, no run test Silva with a bouncer, batsman ducks under early
Hastings to Silva, 1 wide another bouncer, too high this time and one more to the wides tally
Hastings to Silva, no run short of length ball, Silva hops down the crease in an attempt to throw the bowler off his length, played past short leg
Hastings to Silva, no run Silva looks to swing that one towards midwicket, struck on the pads and that was sliding down
Hastings to Silva, no run the outswinger from Hastings, length ball outside off, beats the outside edge
Hastings to Silva, no run and again Silva misses the ball, this time he is looking to drive off the front foot, this was wider than the previous delivery
Hastings to Silva, no run length ball on off, pushed towards mid-on by Silva
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run full and wide, Mahela eases it past cover for a single
Johnson to Silva, 1 run tries the yorker, just outside off, off the bottom of the bat and squeaks past the stumps, hasn't been the most assured of innings from Silva
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run solidly defended to the off side by Mahela
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide down the leg side, Australia are being very generous here, 13 wides already
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run full and wide, Mahela jabs it towards point
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide yet another wide, full and far outside off, wide No. 14 that one
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run gets it on target this time, length ball on offstump, defended by Mahela
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run homing in on off stump, punched back towards the bowler
Hastings to Silva, no run a bouncer to start the over, perilously close to be a wide
Hastings to Silva, 1 run works this past short leg for a single
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide the 100 comes up with wide No. 15, Aus bowling coach Craig McDermott is going to be an angry man today
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run poked towards point this time

Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run nearly sneaks between bat and pad, that one dips in sharply, and takes the inside-edge as Mahela looks to defend towards the off side, ball rolls towards the leg side instead
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run full and well outside off, pushed towards cover
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run Hastings getting his line right, outside off once more and Mahela dabs it towards point
Doherty to Silva, no run big appeal for lbw as Silva looks to sweep, struck on the pads but was spinning past off stump
Doherty to Silva, no run
Doherty to Silva, SIX runs shot! Silva stretches well forward and sweeps powerfully, there is a deep backward square but this one has the legs to clear the rope

Doherty to Silva, FOUR runs swept again, and another boundary for him, this time he gets it very square, that goes a long way to the rope before bouncing, batsmen punch gloves as Sri Lanka take control
Doherty to Silva, no run carefully defended back to the bowler
Doherty to Silva, no run played with a bit of an open face towards point
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs shortish and down the leg side, pulled, high on the bat as it runs down to fine leg
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run Pattinson gets this one to move in as well, played behind square leg

Pattinson to Silva, 1 run short of length ball on legstump, tucks it to the leg side for the single that brings up his half-century, he has a huge smile on his face after getting to the landmark, an innings under pressure this
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run Mahela moves across and tucks the ball to square leg
Pattinson to Silva, no run full and on the off, Silva stretches forward and defends it
Pattinson to Silva, no run a bouncer to end the over and Silva ducks under that one
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball heading for off, blocked towards the bowler
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball on off, guided towards point
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed back towards the bowler, Mahela is playing a patient hand here
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run that spins away after pitching on off, Mahela backs away to make more room and cuts that towards point
Doherty to Silva, no run jumps down the track and taps the ball to the off side
Doherty to Silva, no run Silva very confident against the spinner, pats the ball towards point, thinks of the single but decides against it
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run Mahela punches the first ball towards mid-off

Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs awesome placement from Mahela, a short ball is pulled behind square for four, Marsh races across from square leg while there a fielder at backward square leg as well, the ball manages to evade both
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run helps it along to fine leg
Pattinson to Silva, 1 run short and a bit of width, Silva slaps that down to deep backward point
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run short and outside off, Mahela rides the bounce, steers the ball down to third man
Pattinson to Silva, no run short of length ball and outside off, defended to the off side
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run spins sharply away from Mahela, who lets pushes at it but doesn't edge
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fuller delivery this time, punched back to the bowler
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run briefly in the air prompting cries of catch it, but that lands wide of a diving short cover
Doherty to Silva, no run tucked to short fine leg, Silva wants one, Mahela doesn't
Doherty to Silva, FOUR runs superb from Silva, the reverse-sweep, premeditated, gets the power and placement right and that's four to third man
Doherty to Silva, no run gets nicely forward and defends it
Hussey to Mahela Jayawardene, no run turn on offer, spinning in but hits Mahela on the pads outside off
Hussey to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run tucked towards square leg
Hussey to Silva, no run attempts a flamboyant drive after getting to the pitch, can't get hold of it and it is sent back towards the bowler
Hussey to Silva, 1 run very wide outside off, cut hard towards point
Hussey to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run delicately done by Mahela, makes room and guides the ball to third man
Hussey to Silva, 2 runs an elegant front-foot drive from Silva, very well timed and sweeper cover has plenty of ground to make to cut that off
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run driven towards sweeper cover off the front foot
Doherty to Silva, no run gets well forward and defends towards point
Doherty to Silva, 2 runs that sweep shot again, gets it to deep backward square leg where a fumble allows an extra run
Doherty to Silva, no run looks to guide that towards third man
Doherty to Silva, no run solid forward defensive, keeping bat and pad together
Doherty to Silva, 1 run heading for leg stump, clipped towards square leg for a single
Watson to Silva, 1 run well well, Silva shimmies down the track and looks to pull that one, mistimed towards mid-off
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball just outside off, carefully defended by Mahela
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run short of length and just outside off, guided behind point
Watson to Silva, 1 run a wristy shot towards wide mid-on for a single, Silva continues to move round in the crease before the bowler delivers
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball heading for off, solidly defended back down the track
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run glided down to third man for a single
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run blocked off the front foot towards cover

Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 3 runs inside-out lofted drive towards sweeper cover, the fielder dives and tries to relay throw the ball, but gets it past the supporting fielder so Sri Lanka get three
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run speared in towards leg stump, carefully defended towards the bowler
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run first ball after the interruption is defended towards the off side
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run a silken drive down to long-off for a single
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball on off stump, blocked to the off side
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run once more, defended off the front foot to the off side
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short of length ball, soft hands as Mahela defends
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run looks to chop a short of length ball, if he had nibbled that australia would have been well and truly back in the game
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 leg bye on leg stump, off the pads and down to fine leg, that pitched outside leg
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run driven nicely off the front foot, wide of covers for a single
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run tossed up, full and on legstump, blocked to the leg side
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run again into the pads, tucked towards midwicket for a single
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run length ball outside off this time, pushed towards cover
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run a bit of an outside edge as Angelo drives towards extra cover, Sri Lanka's 150 comes up
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball is pushed back to the bowler
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run blocked that quicker one with an open face
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs nicely finds the gap, gets forward and taps the ball past cover for a couple
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run back of length and outside off, pushed towards extra cover
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run low full toss outside off, Mathews pats it back to the bowler
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball is punched past the bowler, mid-off comes across to field

Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run short ball doesn't rise up as much as Angelo expects, he drops his wrists as he lets that one through, it was a slower one as well, doesn't carry through to the keeper
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run driven to cover off the front foot, no run there
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball on off, careful defence off the front foot
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed towards cover once more
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run more defence from Mahela
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length ball outside off, pushed off the front foot to cover
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run down the leg side, tucked behind square for one more
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run deadbatted off the front foot by Mathews
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run short of length ball just outside off, guided down to third man
Watson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run short and wide, slapped towards sweeper cover off the back foot
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run blocked towards mid-on
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run the inside-edge saves Mahela, this one nips back after pitching short of a length, Mahela edges it on to his pads, the ball rolls towards short third
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed back towards the bowler
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run short of length and on middle and leg, guided down to fine leg
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run more watchfulness from Sri Lanka, Mahela blocks it to the off side
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs a length ball on middle and off is swept down to fine leg

Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs close call for Mahela, that one spins away from Mahela, who gets an inside-edge as he looks to play it to the off side, it is a thick edge, thick enough to comfortably beat Haddin, but not to crash into the stumps
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs worked to backward square leg to complete his half-century
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run blocked off the front foot towards the off side
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run flighted ball, pushed towards mid-off for a single
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run a swing and a miss outside off, it was full and wide from Watson, Mahela doesn't get the edge
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs Mahela leading a charmed life here, another inside-edge as the ball seams in, this time the edge takes the ball past legstump
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs opens the face and sends it towards third man where a fumble gives away an extra run
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run looks to clip the ball to the leg side, misses and is hit on the pads, that was sliding down
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run big forward stride as Mahela defends to the off side
Watson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run more watchful defence, towards extra cover
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run good bounce as he angles that away from Mathews, who shoulders arms
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run drops it towards midwicket
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run short of a length on legstump, worked in front of square
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run angles across Mahela, who is initially drawn towards it but he withdraws the bat well in time
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run nearly another wide from Australia, Rauf decides that close enough to offstump
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run full ball on middle and leg is defended back towards the bowler
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run mistimed to the right of the bowler
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run punched from the crease towards cover
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run short of length ball just outside off, defended to the leg side
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run similar delivery, blocked to the off side by Mathews, in no hurry whatsoever here Sri Lanka
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, 3 runs overpitched and on the pads, whipped wide of mid-on, he outfield has slowed down after the rain, Angelo scampers three
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run crisply driven by Mahela, straight to short cover
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run short of length and angling across, guided behind point

Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run a bouncer and Mathews doesn't play that very well, he didn't get out of the line of the ball, starts to ducks and then attempts a cramped pull, which sends the ball to the leg side
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run angling across once more, Mahela is drawn to it but then tucks it close to his body to leave
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run steered down to fine leg after shuffling across
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 leg bye a quick one on the pads, rolls down to fine leg
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short of length ball on middle stump, blocked back down the pitch
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run clipped in front of square leg for a comfortable single

Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run Mahela should have been run out but he survives< he pushes the ball towards mid-on, where Doherty makes a smart stop, Mahela was watching the ball as he started running the single, Mathews takes a couple of steps before sending Mahela back, Mahela is more than halfway down, and has to scramble back, the thr
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run chopped towards cover for a single
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run defended to the right of the bowler
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run short and well outside off, looks to pull that, off the bottom edge as the ball dribbles to the leg side
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run short of length ball outside off, defended back towards the bowler
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run seams in after pitching outside of, Mahela edges it on to the pads
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run short and wide, easily guided down to third man
Hastings to Angelo Mathews, no run jags in once more, from a short of length, blocked to the bowler
Hastings to Angelo Mathews, no run another push to the off side
Hastings to Angelo Mathews, no run keeps it around off, defended towards the leg side
Hastings to Angelo Mathews, 1 run a flamboyant pull to deep midwicket for a single
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball outside off, driven towards mid-off
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run length ball on middle and leg, helped towards wide mid-on for an easy single
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs full and slanting down, Mahela helps it along to fine leg for a freebie four
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short of length ball just outside off, defended towards square leg
Pattinson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run a moment of panic for Mahela, as his lofted drive just loops over cover for a single
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run full delivery is punched back to the bowler
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short of length ball outside off, careful defence to the off side
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run played with soft hands towards point, sets off for a single but a loud 'No' from Mathews send him back
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run slapped towards point by Mahela
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short ball on off and middle, Mahela ducks under
Hastings to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run pulled down to deep backward square leg for a single
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs shot! where did that come from? Mahela was all patience so far, suddenly he jumps out of the crease to play a lofted inside-out drive over mid-off for four
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run back to watchfulness, defended to the leg side
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run pushed wide of mid-on for a single that brings up the 50 stand
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, no run comes down the track and defends down the track, Doherty collects and fires the ball back towards the stumps
Doherty to Angelo Mathews, 1 run short and wide, steered behind backward point
Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, 1 run short of length ball on middle and leg stump, nudged towards square leg
Hastings to Angelo Mathews, no run full and outside off, blocked towards the bowler
Hastings to Angelo Mathews, no run short of length ball, struck on the pads but that was an optimistic appeal, that was going down leg
Hastings to Angelo Mathews, no run
Hastings to Angelo Mathews, 1 run shortish ball and coming in, Mathews has to contend with some extra bounce, he guides the ball to third man
Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, no run careful defence to the leg side
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs Mathews gets his first boundary, not the most elegant of shots or the best timed, he gets that away over extra cover and the ball runs away for four
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run full ball from Pattinson, defended to the leg side
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run short of length ball outside off, pushed towards cover from the crease
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball outside off, slapped towards cover by Mathews
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run driven to cover after jumping down the track
Pattinson to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball heading for off, blocked by Mathews
Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, no run well outside off, left alone
Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, no run gets the outside edge, the ball loops towards point, Ponting dives forward to take that but it lands short, top effort from Ricky
Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, no run
Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, no run length ball outside off, solid defence to the right of the bowler
Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, no run guides this short of length ball towards point
Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, 2 runs short of length ball, Mendis pulls, the fielder at square leg slips initially, Sri Lanka pick up a couple
Watson to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs driven behind point by Mathews, only seven more needed
Watson to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs outside edge as Mathews looks to run it to third man, it doesn't go as wide as he intends but wide of first slip to run away for four
Watson to Angelo Mathews, no run length ball on middle and that is defended by Mathews
Watson to Eranga, no run defends his first ball confidently
Watson to Eranga, no run outside off, left alone by Eranga
Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, no run angling across and that is left alone

Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, no run huge appeal for lbw, short of a length ball and angling across, Mendis jumps across the stumps and is struck on the thigh pad, that was missing off, and pitched outside leg as well
Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, no run way outside off and that is left alone
Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, no run punched towards mid-off by Mendis
Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, no run defended off the front foot towards cover

Hastings to Jeevan Mendis, FOUR runs it's all over, the final stretch was a hard grind but Sri Lanka have finally made it past the finish line, and it was a streaky shot that confirmed the win, an outside edge past the second slip for four, Sri Lanka are back to No. 2, India slip to No. 3 in both Tests and ODIs on the same day
A beaming Clarke collects the series trophy, and the Australian team gathers round it for photos. So Australia take the series 3-2, the Tests start on August 31st. See you then.
The Man of the Match is Lasith Malinga. Three of the previous seven one-day tricks are by Malinga.
Mahela Jayawardene gets an award first for completing 350 ODIs.
We're set for the presentation ceremony.
I'd normally be required to do a short summary of the series here, but Dan B has done my job. Read his thoughts on the one-day series here.
Sri Lanka won by 4 wickets (with 18 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Lasith Malinga, SL
